snippet.title: Teeny Tiny Town - A small city puzzle builder
snippet.description:
Subscribe to @ShortCircuitStudiosSweden 
Follow on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/shortcircuitstudio/

Welcome to TEENY TINY TOWN, where you can indulge your inner architect and craft your very own bustling city! Merge, build, and watch your town flourish before your eyes.

In this captivating puzzle game, your objective is to combine three or more items on the board to construct new structures. Start with humble trees and transform them into majestic houses, and then merge those houses to create even grander residences! Unleash your creativity and witness your town grow exponentially.

Google Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ShortCircuitStudio.TeenyTinyTown

AppStore:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/teeny-tiny-town/id6449408808
